T02D2778:148b-0: @148b * // bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2778:148b-1: sngags pa gang zhig yul lam dbang po dang las
T02D2778:148b-2: kyi stobs kyis gal te phyi dang nang gi dam
T02D2778:148b-3: tshig nyams pa 'ga' zhig lta bu byung bar gyur
T02D2778:148b-4: na / des 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
T02D2778:148b-5: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dran par byas
T02D2778:148b-6: na / la / lus dang longs spyod dang /
T02D2778:148b-7: gdams ngag la lhag par chags pa yang spangs te /
T02D2778:148b-8: cho ga rnams las ji snyed 'byung ba'i bshags pa dang /
T02D2778:148b-9: spyad pa rnams kyis shin tu gus par rab tu dag par bya'o //
T02D2778:148b-10: de'i yang cho ga rnams kyi gtso //
T02D2778:148b-11: dpal ldan 'jig rten gsum rgyal po //
T02D2778:148b-12: dri ma sbyong ba'i brtag pa las //
T02D2778:148b-13: gang bshad bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'di //
T02D2778:148b-14: padmo dkar rgyas 'dab stong rnam par bye ba yi //
T02D2778:148b-15: lte bar rang sems dri med h'um gi snying po can //
T02D2778:148b-16: sgrib tshogs chags nyams dub khug rna dngul gyi tshul //
T02D2778:148b-17: me long ngos la g-ya'a dag ji bzhin khebs par bsam //
T02D2778:148b-18: de yi gtsug tor nas brgyud pa //
T02D2778:148b-19: dh'u t'i rin chen spangs pa yi //
T02D2778:148b-20: sbu gu dkar po gyen 'greng ba //
T02D2778:148b-21: spyi gtsug bar du gsal bar bya //
T02D2778:148b-22: bdag nyid cod pan nyi zla'i gdan steng 'bar ba la //
T02D2778:149a-1: dang aa ham yab yum phyi nang rim //
T02D2778:149a-2: ji bzhin snyoms 'jug bde chen song nyid bsam gtan la //
T02D2778:149a-3: rtag tu dges bzhugs bdag gi nyams pa gso mdzad bsgom //
T02D2778:149a-4: phyi nang gsang gsum mchod pa dang //
T02D2778:149a-5: bstod sogs rgyas par byas nas ni //
T02D2778:149a-6: 'gyod dang sdom dang dang bar bcas //
T02D2778:149a-7: rtse gcig blo yis gsol bar bya //
T02D2778:149a-8: thog ma kho nar bla ma snyoms zhugs byang chub sems kyi rgyu rab dmar //
T02D2778:149a-9: sbyor mtshams nas sam nyid kyi rdo rje rdo rje rnam dag rtse lnga las //
T02D2778:149a-10: byung ba'i me lces bdag lus kun khyab rlung gi shugs bcas dkrugs pa dang //
T02D2778:149a-11: dngar ba'i shugs kyis ji snyed chags nyams dri ma ma lus bsreg par bya //
T02D2778:149a-12: rdo rje lha yang snyoms par zhugs //
T02D2778:149a-13: thig le dkar h'um bkru ba dang //
T02D2778:149a-14: de bzhin thabs dang shes rab kyang //
T02D2778:149a-15: snyoms 'jug thig le sngon pos gso //
T02D2778:149a-16: cho ga dam pa 'di yis ni //
T02D2778:149a-17: mi gang shes dang mi shes dang //
T02D2778:149a-18: ma dad nga rgyal mang ba dang//
T02D2778:149a-19: bsnyen sogs rgyu yis lam nyams pa //
T02D2778:149a-20: de dag myur du gza' las thar ba'i zla ba bzhin //
T02D2778:149a-21: zla ba gcig gam yang na gnyis nyid de ste gsum //
T02D2778:149a-22: brtson dang gus drag the tshom yid gnyis bsal nas ni //
T02D2778:149a-23: rig ma mchog bcas snyoms par zhugs na nges par grol //
